Name: Lost Silver City
Title: Lost Silver City
Desc: The vanguard team is back with an important piece of information. They found a lost ancient city deep among the snow mountains. Judging from its coordinates and the surroundings, it's highly possible that it was the "Silver City" that had vanished overnight years ago.
UnOpenDesc: Silver City always welcomes every guest.

Name: Lost Silver City
Title: Lost Silver City
Desc: According to the legend, the ruler of the Silver City, Queen Lapris, found a vein of silver, which brought her endless wealth and protected the city from war for decades.\n\nHowever, the rich nobles in the City gradually became dissatisfied with the Queen's rule. They rebelled, hoping to dethrone her and have the wealth all to themselves.
UnOpenDesc: Silver City always welcomes every guest.

Name: Lost Silver City
Title: Lost Silver City
Desc: In the final part of the story, the Queen's death didn't stop the nobles. They went on killing one another just to get one more Silver Coin from others.\n\nIn the end, the once renowned Silver City fell. No matter how glorious their lives were, all of them turned into piles of bones buried under the dusty bricks, away from the daylight, leaving endless treasures behind for people to explore.
UnOpenDesc: Silver City always welcomes every guest.

Name: Lost Silver City
Title: Lost Silver City
Desc: Having heard about the history of the Silver City and everything from the vanguard team, you decided to...\n\n(Note: The Silver City is affected by the curse of Queen Lapris, you can only kill enemies through Proxy Battle.)
UnOpenDesc: Silver City always welcomes every guest.

Name: Lost Silver City
Title: Lost Silver City
Desc: The Silver City has too many secrets. Now it's not the right time to reveal them. You decide to leave the vanguard team's information aside.
UnOpenDesc: Silver City always welcomes every guest.

Name: Lost Silver City
Title: Lost Silver City
Desc: With the information provided by the vanguard team, you set off for the mysterious ancient city.\n\n(Note: After you enter the lost Silver City, your Silver Coins will be reset to 500 due to the curse.)
UnOpenDesc: Silver City always welcomes every guest.

RoleContent: Organize your order of exploration wisely, everyone. As long as time's enough, we can bring as many treasures back as we want.
Name: Lost Silver City
Title: Lost Silver City
Desc: Just when you walk through the gate of the Silver City, someone finds a shiny silver talisman under the fallen pillar. It seems the rumors are correct. This long lost city is indeed full of treasures.
UnOpenDesc: Silver City always welcomes every guest.

Name: Lost Silver City
Title: Lost Silver City
Desc: You've already spent quite some time in the Silver City. None of you can carry more items. Perhaps it's a good idea to go back for some rest at the camp.
UnOpenDesc: Silver City always welcomes every guest.

Name: Lost Silver City
Title: Lost Silver City
Desc: You are happy with what you have and think there's no need to risk more, so you return to the camp with everything.
UnOpenDesc: Silver City always welcomes every guest.

Name: Lost Silver City
Title: Lost Silver City
Desc: There should be more treasures ahead. Nobody wants to miss this opportunity.\n\n(Note: If you go further, your Silver Coins will be reset to 800 due to the curse.)
UnOpenDesc: Silver City always welcomes every guest.

RoleContent: Only the luckiest human beings can hear my voice... Don't miss the opportunity.
Name: Statue of Greed
Title: Statue of Greed
Desc: An old stone lion blocks your way. It proposes a deal with you. You give it all your money, and it will give you a huge reward in return.
UnOpenDesc: To give is to have.\n\n(Note: Your Silver Coins double when triggered)

RoleContent: Roar... I didn't expect some human being could fight against greed. Take it. You deserve this.
Name: Statue of Greed
Title: Statue of Greed
Desc: Tatyana follows the lion's order and pours all the Silver Coins into its big mouth.

Name: Statue of Greed
Title: Statue of Greed
Desc: A moment later, a large amount of shiny Silver Coins pour out from another stone lion on the opposite side. And the one before you falls silent.

Name: Statue of Greed
Title: Statue of Greed
Desc: You ignore the weird statue. Perhaps it's just some kind of a prank.

Name: Arrogant Servant
Title: Arrogant Servant
Desc: When you're walking through the dark garden corridor, a pale old man emerges from the shadow of the trees. He reaches out his palm and asks you to hand him all the Silver Coins on you. In return, he promises that he will make you his most trusted family servants.
UnOpenDesc: Desire can never be satisfied.\n\n(Note: Your Silver Coins halve when triggered)

RoleContent: That's not enough... I can't stop here. I must become the most prominent nobleman in the Silver City.
Name: Arrogant Servant
Title: Arrogant Servant
Desc: The old man's deadly pale face and weird behavior make it far from a regular conversation. You immediately decide to run away.

RoleContent: Hahaha... You can't escape me! Both of the city and you are mine!
Name: Arrogant Servant
Title: Arrogant Servant
Desc: The old man's voice sounds like an echo from the underground, haunting you from behind.

Name: Arrogant Servant
Title: Arrogant Servant
Desc: The voice is already gone when you finally make it to the open space in the bright sunlight. Someone takes a look into the bag and cries out in shock that half of the Silver Coins in it have somehow vanished.

RoleContent: It's my duty to protect the Queen... However, I can pretend you didn't come as long as you pay me enough.
Name: Knight of Evil Will
Title: Knight of Evil Will
Desc: An old knight armor stands before the gate. A hollow voice of obsession comes out from the armor, asking the visitor for a hundred Silver Coins as bribe.
UnOpenDesc: Evil will stem from temptation.\n\n(Note: Grants Silver Coins -100 once triggered)

RoleContent: I see... Lapris, is this your curse too...?
Name: Knight of Evil Will
Title: Knight of Evil Will
Desc: Tatyana put the Silver Coins on the armor's hand. The minute the Silver Coins fall on the armor's palm and clang, the old armor collapses and turns into a pile of iron dust before the gate.

RoleContent: The curse of the Silver City has been around for a long time. Please set Queen Lapris free!
Name: Girl by the Grave
Title: Girl by the Grave
Desc: You pass an old but carefully tidied-up grave. The girl by the grave gives you some simple gifts.
UnOpenDesc: This is a precious resting point.\n\n(Note: Grants Silver Coins +100 once triggered)

RoleContent: Great... Hope the Statue of Greed won't devour passersby anymore. Travelers, don't be fooled by any temptations on your way. Hope you can get out of this place.
Name: Girl by the Grave
Title: Girl by the Grave
Desc: Tatyana accepts the girl's gifts. She lets out a happy sigh and gives you a piece of advice.
UnOpenDesc: This is a precious resting point.

RoleContent: You refused... No wonder you defeated the Statue of Greed. Just go ahead. It looks like you've already got a more powerful weapon with you.
Name: Girl by the Grave
Title: Girl by the Grave
Desc: The girl bows deeply to you and walks back into the forest.
UnOpenDesc: This is a precious resting point.

Name: Lost Silver City
Title: Lost Silver City
Desc: You arrive at the deepest area of the Silver City. On the long empty throne sits a skeleton in faded royal attire. Ironically, its dusty skull is still wearing a silver crown.
UnOpenDesc: Silver City always welcomes every guest.

RoleContent: I guess he's not the legendary Queen Lapris. Let's move on.
Name: Lost Silver City
Title: Lost Silver City
Desc: Tatyana checks the skeleton and makes two conclusions: One, the skeleton belongs to a male. Two, judging from the weird dark green color on the surface of the skeleton, this person died from poisoning.
UnOpenDesc: Silver City always welcomes every guest.

Name: Lost Silver City
Title: Lost Silver City
Desc: Walking deeper into the fallen kingdom, you finally see the truth behind the Silver City's "curse"â€”a corrupted Construct has been wandering around in the depths of the ruins.
UnOpenDesc: Silver City always welcomes every guest.

Name: Lost Silver City
Title: Lost Silver City
Desc: A long time ago, she wandered to the Silver City, happened to read Queen Lapris' last words before death, and learned about the history of the fall of the Silver City.
UnOpenDesc: Silver City always welcomes every guest.

RoleContent: What did I do wrong? I granted you harvest, infinite fortune, and endless food... Yet you cut off my head for more Silver Coins!
Name: Lost Silver City
Title: Lost Silver City
Desc: So, this Corrupted, whose Memory was already a mess, mistook herself as "Queen Lapris" and planted the Queen's hate into her M.I.N.D., controlling other corrupted mechanoids in the name of the "Statue of Greed" to kill those passersby who attempted to take away the wealth of the city.
UnOpenDesc: Silver City always welcomes every guest.

RoleContent: Then let me devour your greed and grant you the karma and destruction you deserve! You will never have the Silver Cityâ€”!
Name: Lost Silver City
Title: Lost Silver City
Desc: The Construct's Memory has been completely corrupted. There's no space for negotiation. A battle is inevitable.
UnOpenDesc: Silver City always welcomes every guest.

Name: Lost Silver City
Title: Lost Silver City
Desc: The core of the Corrupted has been destroyed. Her long sinful life has also come to an end.
UnOpenDesc: Silver City always welcomes every guest.

RoleContent: The world didn't treat me fairly, so I wanted revenge... What's wrong about it?
Name: Lost Silver City
Title: Lost Silver City
Desc: Her M.I.N.D. seems to have become clearer during the last few minutes before her core stops beating. Lying on among the ruins, she looks up at the sun above her head and asks you her last question.
UnOpenDesc: Silver City always welcomes every guest.

RoleContent: ...I guess only the real "Queen Lapris" can answer that.
Name: Lost Silver City
Title: Lost Silver City
Desc: There was no response. The spark in her eyes fades.
UnOpenDesc: Silver City always welcomes every guest.

Name: Lost Silver City
Title: Lost Silver City
Desc: You bury the corrupted Construct and tell the girl by the grave the truth of the "curse." You give her your remaining Silver Coins and leave the lost city.
UnOpenDesc: Silver City always welcomes every guest.

Name: Chilly Wind Valley
Title: Chilly Wind Valley
Desc: You pass by a narrow valley. On the stone tablet at the entrance, there is a simple proverb inscription in ancient polar language that reads,\n"Dare to challenge the path less traveled."
UnOpenDesc: Dare to challenge the path less traveled.

Name: Chilly Wind Valley
Title: Chilly Wind Valley
Desc: "Dare to challenge the path less traveled."
UnOpenDesc: Dare to challenge the path less traveled.

Name: Chilly Wind Valley
Title: Chilly Wind Valley
Desc: It reminds you of an old tale. A long time ago, the polar residents would send young people in the tribe to this valley to attend a trial. Only the ones who successfully walk out of the valley would be recognized by the tribe and become true warriors.
UnOpenDesc: Dare to challenge the path less traveled.

Name: Chilly Wind Valley
Title: Chilly Wind Valley
Desc: There seem to be a lot of items and clues left by the polar residents in the valley. You will probably get some good stuff after some exploration. Would you like to enter the Chilly Wind Valley?\n\n(Note: The valley presents a difficult challenge. You are not allowed to kill enemies through normal battles. Please think twice before you decide.)
UnOpenDesc: Dare to challenge the path less traveled.

Name: Chilly Wind Valley
Title: Chilly Wind Valley
Desc: Now's not the time to fight. Let's leave it for later.
UnOpenDesc: Dare to challenge the path less traveled.

Name: Chilly Wind Valley
Title: Chilly Wind Valley
Desc: You walk into the old valley with caution.
UnOpenDesc: Dare to challenge the path less traveled.

Name: Chilly Wind Valley
Title: Chilly Wind Valley
Desc: You kept going for a while. The wind in the narrow valley gets fiercer as if it is turning the area into an ancient arena for the adventurers.
UnOpenDesc: Dare to challenge the path less traveled.

RoleContent: It will only get harder from here. Are you guys ready?
Name: Chilly Wind Valley
Title: Chilly Wind Valley
Desc: But you also found plenty of supplies left by the previous residents. You may have other findings if you keep going.
UnOpenDesc: Dare to challenge the path less traveled.

Name: Chilly Wind Valley
Title: Chilly Wind Valley
Desc: You are happy with what you have and decide to go back immediately.
UnOpenDesc: Dare to challenge the path less traveled.

Name: Chilly Wind Valley
Title: Chilly Wind Valley
Desc: You jump into a steep snow hole. Before your eyes are jagged rocks covered by the snow. It becomes more and more dangerous as the passage narrows, but there's no turning back as the way behind you has been blocked off by the snow cliff.
UnOpenDesc: Dare to challenge the path less traveled.

RoleContent: ...This is too obvious. Did they want who came later to bring it back to their family?
Name: Chilly Wind Valley
Title: Chilly Wind Valley
Desc: Tatyana takes an ancient necklace off the wall. Looks like someone left it here but didn't make it back to retrieve it.\n(Note: Once you enter the valley, <color=#DC143C>your Construction Permits will be reset to 22</color> due to the environment.)
UnOpenDesc: Dare to challenge the path less traveled.

Name: Chilly Wind Valley
Title: Chilly Wind Valley
Desc: She takes off the necklace carefully, wears it on her chest, and heads for the deeper area.
UnOpenDesc: Dare to challenge the path less traveled.

Name: Chilly Wind Valley
Title: Chilly Wind Valley
Desc: Out of the snow hole, you find a simple cabin nearby. In front of its door is a piece of text written in ancient polar language:
UnOpenDesc: Dare to challenge the path less traveled.

Name: Chilly Wind Valley
Title: Chilly Wind Valley
Desc: "Warriors, rest here for one night before you start the real trial."
UnOpenDesc: Dare to challenge the path less traveled.

Name: Chilly Wind Valley
Title: Chilly Wind Valley
Desc: Chilly Wind Valley's exit is right before your eyes, but none of you have run into anything close to the 'trial' described in the inscription, except for the mechanisms that seem to be a part of the trial you saw on your way here. But those mechanisms haven't been maintained properly for a long time and can no longer work properly.
UnOpenDesc: Dare to challenge the path less traveled.

Name: Chilly Wind Valley
Title: Chilly Wind Valley
Desc: When everyone is still trying to figure out the situation, a large group of Corrupted rush down from both sides of the valley. It seems they've been waiting there for a long time for an ambush when you reach the narrow part of the road near the entrance.
UnOpenDesc: Dare to challenge the path less traveled.

RoleContent: I was wondering when you guys would show up. Thank you for waiting. I can't wait anymore!
Name: Chilly Wind Valley
Title: Chilly Wind Valley
Desc: Facing the incoming Corrupted crowd, Tatyana asks you to hide behind and form a defense formation.
UnOpenDesc: Dare to challenge the path less traveled.

Name: Chilly Wind Valley
Title: Chilly Wind Valley
Desc: You take out all the Corrupted. Someone screams when you're cleaning up the battlefield.\n\nTatyana rushes to where the scream comes from and finds a Corrupted penetrated by an old spear that matches the necklace you picked up on the way.
UnOpenDesc: Dare to challenge the path less traveled.

Name: Chilly Wind Valley
Title: Chilly Wind Valley
Desc: She pulls out the polar resident's spear. Its handle is full of dark bloodstains and an old bloody handprint. It seems someone used their last strength to plunge the spear into the Corrupted before death.
UnOpenDesc: Dare to challenge the path less traveled.

Name: Chilly Wind Valley
Title: Chilly Wind Valley
Desc: Considering what you've seen so far, you quickly come to a conclusion that this place used to be the trial venue of the polar residents. Some of them were trial officers who built the broken mechanisms you saw on the way.
UnOpenDesc: Dare to challenge the path less traveled.

Name: Chilly Wind Valley
Title: Chilly Wind Valley
Desc: However, decades ago, the Punishing Virus broke out, and countless Corrupted rushed into the Chilly Wind Valley. To prevent the Corrupted from getting out, the trial officers stayed here and had a fierce battle against the Corrupted.
UnOpenDesc: Dare to challenge the path less traveled.

RoleContent: "Dare to challenge the path less traveled?" ...It seems they did live up to their names.
Name: Chilly Wind Valley
Title: Chilly Wind Valley
Desc: The result of the battle is obvious. The Chilly Wind Valley was then deserted and gradually became a silent tombstone in the endless harsh wind and snow.
UnOpenDesc: Dare to challenge the path less traveled.

Name: Chilly Wind Valley
Title: Chilly Wind Valley
Desc: You stick the broken spear on the top of the highest mountain in the valley and hang the ancient necklace on the tip of the spear. After that, every time when the wind blows, the sound of the past will echo in the valley.\n\nBack to New Sophiasburgh, you hear that when you were away, the city was preparing for an important decision-making meeting to be held right after you're back.
UnOpenDesc: Dare to challenge the path less traveled.

Name: Chilly Wind Valley
Title: Chilly Wind Valley
Desc: You decide to go deep into the valley.\n(Note: Once you enter the valley, <color=#DC143C>your Construction Permits will be reset to 21</color> due to the environment.)
UnOpenDesc: Dare to challenge the path less traveled.

RoleContent: This one still works. Let's take it.
Name: Chilly Wind Valley
Title: Chilly Wind Valley
Desc: Soon after moving along the predecessor's trail, you come across a hunter's bow on the ground left by some ancient polar resident.\n(Note: Once you enter the valley, <color=#DC143C>your Construction Permits will be reset to 15</color> due to the environment.)
UnOpenDesc: Dare to challenge the path less traveled.

Name: Polar Revival Project
Title: Polar Revival Project
Desc: When traveling around the snowfield, you come across a traveling merchant. He appears to be in good spirits despite his shabby clothes. According to him, he traveled around to revive the polar and believes that economic development is the key.

RoleContent: Dear fellow citizens, believe me. Just a small amount of investment, and you will get more than you invested.
Name: Polar Revival Project
Title: Polar Revival Project
Desc: However, his speech seems unrealistic. None of the passerbys seem to buy it. He speaks for hours with great enthusiasm on the open ground without any responses.

RoleContent: Trust my strategic insight! Join hands and we can bring prosperity back to the polar!
Name: Polar Revival Project
Title: Polar Revival Project
Desc: The merchant's speech is sincere and touching. He doesn't look like a fraud. But is it really that easy to realize his grand dream?

RoleContent: Oh my God, our Polar Revival Project has finally welcomed its first investor! To prove my words, I will give you more than you invested.
Name: Polar Revival Project
Title: Polar Revival Project
Desc: You provide the merchant with some financial assistance. His eyes sparkle with happiness.\n\nHe accepts it seriously and explains to you that the Polar Commune is the first bunch of customers who helped him. He will thank you with some of the most valuable resources.

RoleContent: This should be enough for one journey. But if you are willing to, you can support me for a journey to the Atlantic. There are more rare supplies over there.
Name: Polar Revival Project
Title: Polar Revival Project
Desc: However, he still stands there after taking the money. It seems he still has something to say. He hesitates a bit and explains to you that if you can invest a bit more, he will give you more return.

RoleContent: ...Thank you for trusting me. I'll not let you down.
Name: Polar Revival Project
Title: Polar Revival Project
Desc: Commune members decide to go the extra mile and give him another sum of money.

RoleContent: Goodbye, my friends! I'm leaving! Wait for my good news!
Name: Polar Revival Project
Title: Polar Revival Project
Desc: To thank you for your trust, he gives you another batch of rare supplies as a gift to the Commune and sets off again.

Name: Polar Revival Project
Title: Polar Revival Project
Desc: It seems that the merchant will come back with new goods later. Say hello to him if you run into him again on the snowfield.

RoleContent: It's fine. I understand it's not easy to trust anyone here, but my goods are the best in this area. Don't forget to come back in case you change your mind.
Name: Polar Revival Project
Title: Polar Revival Project
Desc: You refuse the merchant. He looks a bit disappointed, but he quickly pulls himself together and gives you a confident smile.

RoleContent: Bye.
Name: Polar Revival Project
Title: Polar Revival Project
Desc: The next town is far away from here, and there won't be any supply points ahead for a long time. Leaving him alone in the snowstorm doesn't seem to be a good idea. Are you sure you don't want to ask him to stay?

Name: Polar Revival Project
Title: Polar Revival Project
Desc: You eventually decide to believe him after discussion.

Name: Polar Revival Project
Title: Polar Revival Project
Desc: The merchant leaves. Nobody has heard of him ever since.

RoleContent: Long time no see, customers! Thank you for your help earlier! I'm back from the Atlantic with some supplies. To return your favor, I can let you guys pick first!
Name: Polar Revival Project
Title: Polar Revival Project
Desc: Looking into the distance from the top of the mountain, you see that familiar figure again on the snowfield.

Name: Polar Revival Project
Title: Polar Revival Project
Desc: To return the Commune's favor earlier, the merchant lays out various items on the ground and allows you to pick them. Just like he said, these items are hard to come by out there.

RoleContent: These are all good stuff, but... these are hard to come by, so I'm afraid I can't let you have them for free. But I will give you reasonable prices.
Name: Polar Revival Project
Title: Polar Revival Project
Desc: After the trade, the merchant secretly takes out another heavy big bag full of rare items that he doesn't normally show to general customers.

Name: Polar Revival Project
Title: Polar Revival Project
Desc: The Commune members do another trade with the merchant. Just like he said, these are good stuff that is hard to come by elsewhere.

RoleContent: Thank you for your business. I need to set off for the next village. Until next time!
Name: Polar Revival Project
Title: Polar Revival Project
Desc: After the trade, the merchant picks up his bag again and sets off for the next settlement.

RoleContent: Oh! No problem. I understand that sometimes you don't need anything. Then, until next time, customers!
Name: Polar Revival Project
Title: Polar Revival Project
Desc: The merchant picks up his bag again, says goodbye to you, and sets off for the next settlement.

Name: Polar Revival Project
Title: Polar Revival Project
Desc: You run into the merchant again in some dilapidated town. However, unlike before, he's surrounded by a group of kids this time. They seem to be close.

RoleContent: Actually, the reason why I worked so hard to raise money is to build a facility for these kids to get education. When they have knowledge, they can help me and pass on their knowledge to others. This way, the polar can be revived one day.
Name: Polar Revival Project
Title: Polar Revival Project
Desc: Seeing that you are with the Commune, the merchant welcomes you warmly and explains the reason why he traveled around to raise money for the first time.

RoleContent: With more educated people, knowledge will be spread more widely. And one day, there will be hundreds of people participating in the "Polar Revival Project"... Right?
Name: Polar Revival Project
Title: Polar Revival Project
Desc: Tatyana quickly understands what the merchant means.

RoleContent: That's right. No matter how fierce the Punishing Virus is, as long as we pass on knowledge and wisdom, human beings will never be defeated.
Name: Polar Revival Project
Title: Polar Revival Project
Desc: The merchant nods to agree.

RoleContent: However, the money I got so far is far from enough to realize this grand dream. But these kids can't wait any longer...
Name: Polar Revival Project
Title: Polar Revival Project
Desc: Saying so, he pauses a bit, scratches his head, and gives you the same old confident smile.

RoleContent: Oh, that's fine. I shouldn't have bothered you with my own business. Thank you for your help so far. I'm grateful for that.
Name: Polar Revival Project
Title: Polar Revival Project
Desc: Tatyana tactfully suggests that the Commune doesn't have much money as well and apologizes for not being able to help him.

RoleContent: Goodbye, customers. You're welcome to come back anytime.
Name: Polar Revival Project
Title: Polar Revival Project
Desc: The merchant takes you to the gate of the village with the kids and waves goodbye to you.

RoleContent: See you!
Name: Polar Revival Project
Title: Polar Revival Project
Desc: The kids' innocent voices echo in the valley.

Name: Polar Revival Project
Title: Polar Revival Project
Desc: Tatyana tells him that the Border Commune is building a new polar city named New Sophiasburgh and that he can settle down with the kids over there, which is safer than staying here in this dilapidated village.

RoleContent: However, with all that I have, I don't think it's possible for me to travel all the way across the snowfield with the kids.
Name: Polar Revival Project
Title: Polar Revival Project
Desc: Hearing this, the traveler looks thrilled but quickly calms down.

RoleContent: That's great... Sorry, I'm not good with words, but I don't know how to express my gratitude for this. You have changed their lives.
Name: Polar Revival Project
Title: Polar Revival Project
Desc: Tatyana tells the merchant that this is not a problem. She can send more people over to escort everyone safely to New Sophiasburgh. He smiles with relief.

RoleContent: This bag holds everything these kids' parents left for them before setting off to find a new settlement. But years past, they are still not back... So I think it's better to let you have it.
Name: Polar Revival Project
Title: Polar Revival Project
Desc: He turns around and searches for a while in the room. Then, he hands you a leather pag to you with great caution.

RoleContent: Thank you. You are the true heroes who realized the 'Polar Revival Project.'
Name: Polar Revival Project
Title: Polar Revival Project
Desc: He takes off his hat and bows deeply to you.

RoleContent: From the time we were driven out of our homeland and began our migration, to lighting the first campfire here, we've spent countless nights with New Sophiasburgh, this new city of ideals.
Name: Decision
Title: Decision
TitleContent: The Future of the City
Desc: The expedition finds only back from the outside that while they were away, the Antonov couple gathered all the core members of the Border Commune together for a meeting to discuss about the future development of the city. Now everything's ready. The voting will start right away.
UnOpenDesc: An important meeting is being held in the city.

RoleContent: Thank you all for your valuable contribution. New Sophiasburgh is our home, and every inhabitant in it a treasure. As long as our will remains united, this city will stand strong.
Name: Decision

TitleContent: The Future of the City
Desc: Carefully write down your thoughts on the issue, and place the letter into the feedback box.
UnOpenDesc: An important meeting is being held in the city.

Name: Nameless Lab
Title: Nameless Lab
Desc: The advance team responsible for Golden Age relics excavation has reported back on a nameless lab that seems to hold a lot of classified research materials among the snow mountains.

Name: Nameless Lab
Title: Nameless Lab
Desc: However, further exploration requires more people.

Name: Nameless Lab
Title: Nameless Lab
Desc: After careful consideration, the logistics department deems it a waste of resources and decides to set the message aside for now.

Name: Nameless Lab
Title: Nameless Lab
Desc:
With the help of the logistics department, the advance team has quickly set up a temporary base near the snow mountains and started working right away.
Unfortunately, most of the data in the old terminal were lost due to the extreme weather. Despite the efforts, the team has only managed to recycle some usable terminal parts and recover a seemingly important research note.

The word "Narwhal" is mentioned repeatedly throughout the file, along with a word that confuses themâ€”"Matrix".

Name: Nameless Lab
Title: Nameless Lab
Desc: The word "Narwhal" is mentioned repeatedly throughout the file, along with a word that confuses themâ€”"Matrix".

Name: Nameless Lab
Title: Nameless Lab
Desc:
An Incomplete Note

Boss seems to be fascinated by Leibowitz's "Matrix" Project and plans to introduce it to our lab.

This is ridiculous! We already have enough variables to calculate and record. Are we going to hand over our fate to the terminal after replacing real animals with bionic ones?

I can't accept that. I've made up my mind. Tomorrow, I'm gonna tell my boss that either they drop the idea of installing that thing on my terminal, or I'll quit.

Name: Nameless Lab
Title: Nameless Lab
Desc:
We've made a terrible mistake. We were completely wrong.

I've realized that Narwhal can never become an integral part of the biosphere. Machines can never bear the responsibility of natural selection. These Narwhals, created by my own hands, will inevitably harm countless people, but I can never undo these mistakes in my lifetime.

Before I leave this world, I will use the Gestalt sub-terminal to prevent everything from reaching the worst possible outcome.

I will steal administrative access, and although it's just a simulation program, it should be enough to serve as a "safety valve".

Name: Nameless Lab
Title: Nameless Lab
Desc: Before I leave this world, I will use the Gestalt sub-terminal to prevent everything from reaching the worst possible outcome.\nI will steal administrative access, and although it's just a simulation program, it should be enough to serve as a "safety valve".

Name: Nameless Lab
Title: Nameless Lab
Desc:
Why do I write everything here? Because I want it to be seen and remembered.

Whoever reads this, despise as you wish, because I was not acting out of the idea of saving the world this whole time... I did all of this in the mere hope that those who come after me might forgive me.

(The signature on the file was destroyed and cannot be recovered.)

Name: Nameless Lab
Title: Nameless Lab
Desc: There is a long silence after the team finishes reading the file. Tatyana takes the initiative and breaks the ice.

RoleContent: Let's just hand over any relevant old files we come across in the future to the professionals in New Sophiasburgh.
Name: Nameless Lab
Title: Nameless Lab
Desc: The team nods to agree and decides to move on with the information that might constrain the Narwhal.

Name: Belongings Under the Ice
Title: Belongings Under the Ice
Desc: New Sophiasburgh established a research station that focuses on Narwhals. Not long after that, the station has reported that they seems to have found an abandoned bionic creature factory in an ice lake.

Name: Belongings Under the Ice
Title: Belongings Under the Ice
Desc: Tatyana and a couple of researchers carry out an investigation at the ice lake. On the surface is a giant chunck of ice that is about several meters tall, sealing up the entire lake. It's hard to reach the factory at the bottom just by digging.

Name: Belongings Under the Ice
Title: Belongings Under the Ice
Desc: The logistics department gets a large heater over from New Sophiasburgh and starts to melt the ice on the surface of the lake.\nHowever, the great amount of energy required by the heater and the frequent interruptions caused by water coming our from where the ice is melted have created great challenges for the team, so it ends up taking way more time than expected to enter the factory.

Name: Belongings Under the Ice
Title: Belongings Under the Ice
Desc: The logistics department decides to dig a water channel to direct the water to a nearby valley and then break the ice to get to the bottom.\nHowever, the great amount of energy required by the heater and the frequent interruptions caused by water coming our from where the ice is melted have created great challenges for the team, so it ends up taking way more time than expected to enter the factory.

Name: Belongings Under the Ice
Title: Belongings Under the Ice
Desc: Soaked in water for years, most of the mechanisms and terminals stopped running a lot time ago due to the heavy rust. The team checks around and preliminarily confirms that the factory likely ceased operation during the early Post-Pandemic Age.

RoleContent: It's said that whales can emit "ultra-low-frequency calls" that are only audible to their kind but not to humans. Would it be possible that they added this module so that Narwhals could communicate with whales?
Name: Belongings Under the Ice
Title: Belongings Under the Ice
Desc: In a workshop deep in the factory, they find a large amount of alloy bionic animal skeletons. After comparing them against the blueprint on the assembly table, they notice that a few skeletons have a "low-frequency sound wave receiver" that is missing from the blueprint.

RoleContent: But the Copperfield Financial Group was established to 'maintain the ecosphere by replacing real animals with bionic creatures,' not by making them living happily together, right?
Name: Belongings Under the Ice
Title: Belongings Under the Ice
Desc: He quickly dismisses his guess.

RoleContent: These 'low-frequency sound wave receivers' are less rusty than the industrial equipment nearby. It's like...
Name: Belongings Under the Ice
Title: Belongings Under the Ice
Desc: Tatyana compares the skeletons in the workshop against the blueprint and finds another discrepancy that is even harder to detect.

RoleContent: It's like someone came here ahead of us, drained the lake to get in, and installed the receivers. But water came into the factory before he could finish his job.
Name: Belongings Under the Ice
Title: Belongings Under the Ice
Desc: She ponders for a moment and moves on to her speculation carefully.

Name: Belongings Under the Ice
Title: Belongings Under the Ice
Desc: The speculation has shocked everyone.\nIf there some guy came in and did this, what would be the purpose? Would that guy have anything to do with the nameless lab they just found?

Name: Astrologer in the Tower's Top Attic
Title: Astrologer in the Tower's Top Attic
Desc: During a short expedition, the team comes across an ancient tower. In the top chamber lives an early polar inhabitantâ€”an young female astrologer.\nHer secluded lifestyle and the special location of the tower have allowed her to luckily avoid the Corrupted by herself.
UnOpenDesc: Astrologer in the Tower's Top Attic

RoleContent: Which star is the brightest in the sky...?
Name: Astrologer in the Tower's Top Attic
Title: Astrologer in the Tower's Top Attic
Desc: To thank you for the update on the outside world, she decides to do a free reading for you... However, as usual, she needs you to answer a few questions first.
UnOpenDesc: Astrologer in the Tower's Top Attic

RoleContent: Right. Next question...
Name: Astrologer in the Tower's Top Attic
Title: Astrologer in the Tower's Top Attic
Desc: The young astrologer remains expressionless and noncommittal.
UnOpenDesc: Astrologer in the Tower's Top Attic

RoleContent: It has been a long while since someone last spotted the flaw in the question... Yeah, the sun is also a star and the brightest entity we can observe. Your answer is correct.
Name: Astrologer in the Tower's Top Attic
Title: Astrologer in the Tower's Top Attic
Desc: The young astrologer looks surprised.
UnOpenDesc: Astrologer in the Tower's Top Attic

RoleContent: Between the Sun and the Earth, which one revolves around the other one?
Name: Astrologer in the Tower's Top Attic
Title: Astrologer in the Tower's Top Attic
Desc: The young astrologer turns the pages of the notebook in her hand and throws out another questionâ€”
UnOpenDesc: Astrologer in the Tower's Top Attic

RoleContent: Alright... I've already seen your fate. But unfortunately, I don't think it's the right time for you to 'absorb' this information.
Name: Astrologer in the Tower's Top Attic
Title: Astrologer in the Tower's Top Attic
Desc: The young astrologer closes the book.
UnOpenDesc: Astrologer in the Tower's Top Attic

RoleContent: She gives a silver coin to the person sitting opposite her.
Name: Astrologer in the Tower's Top Attic
Title: Astrologer in the Tower's Top Attic
Desc: She gives a silver coin to the person sitting opposite her.
UnOpenDesc: Astrologer in the Tower's Top Attic

RoleContent: You noticed the trap in my question... That's right. Heliocentric model, geocentric model, they are just models humans constructed based on their own needs. The stars exist for no one. They just keep turning endlessly.
Name: Astrologer in the Tower's Top Attic
Title: Astrologer in the Tower's Top Attic
Desc: The young astrologer looks surprised.
UnOpenDesc: Astrologer in the Tower's Top Attic

RoleContent: Smart as you are, I guess you surely can "fathom" the truth of this world... Don't worry. Your soul realized this long before. Everything here is just a butterfly in a diving bell, a golden brain in a vat.
Name: Astrologer in the Tower's Top Attic
Title: Astrologer in the Tower's Top Attic
Desc: She seems to have gotten the answer she wanted. She gives a satisfied smile, reaches out her hand, and taps gently on Tatyana's forehead.
UnOpenDesc: Astrologer in the Tower's Top Attic

RoleContent: My job is done. It's time to leave. Don't worry. You will meet again... when the time comes.
Name: Astrologer in the Tower's Top Attic
Title: Astrologer in the Tower's Top Attic
Desc: Now Tatyana is the one who gets surprised.
UnOpenDesc: Astrologer in the Tower's Top Attic

Name: Astrologer in the Tower's Top Attic
Title: Astrologer in the Tower's Top Attic
Desc: Saying that, the young astrologer returns to the attic, refusing to speak to the logistics department. The team rests here for the night and sets off again.
UnOpenDesc: Astrologer in the Tower's Top Attic

Name: Wishing Spring
Title: Wishing Spring
Desc: Commune members who were sent to work at the farm earlier has reported that they came across a hot spring during work. After simple construction, it has now come into use as an outdoor public bath.

Name: Wishing Spring
Title: Wishing Spring
Desc: However, someone has discovered a "secret function" of this hot spring and claims that one can get their wishes granted by throwing specific things into the spring.

Name: Wishing Spring
Title: Wishing Spring
Desc: As the rumor gets spread wider and wider, the spring is now filled with people who come here to verify the rumor. To restore the original function of the spring, the commune members want Tatyana to go there to check out.

Name: Wishing Spring
Title: Wishing Spring
Desc: Although the rumor sounds absurd, Tatyana leaves for the mountain with a bunch of weird stuff since everyone is counting on her.

RoleContent: ...I haven't had any salty steamed tangerine for a long time. Let's cook some later back home.
Name: Wishing Spring
Title: Wishing Spring
Desc: Tatyana throws a tangerine into the spring. A pleasant, sweet aroma drifts from the spring.

RoleContent: ...What was I thinking? Could there be a Goddess of Springs in this world?
Name: Wishing Spring
Title: Wishing Spring
Desc: Tatyana throws an axe into the spring. There is a splash, and then silence.

RoleContent: Goodbye, Shark-speare.
Name: Wishing Spring
Title: Wishing Spring
Desc: The plush Shark-speare gets soaked and sinks slowly to the bottom of the spring.

RoleContent: You humans are out of your mind! The silver coins are barely tolerable, and now you're throwing me trash?
Name: Wishing Spring
Title: Wishing Spring
Desc: Tatyana knows that littering is bad, but for some reason, she still throws the can into the spring.\nA voice filled with anger immediately comes from the bottom of the spring.

RoleContent: S-Sorry! I was just curious.
Name: Wishing Spring
Title: Wishing Spring
Desc: Hearing the mysterious voice, she blurts out the apology before her brain can figure out who the speaker is.

RoleContent: Save your efforts. I can give you money and treasure if those are what you want.
Name: Wishing Spring
Title: Wishing Spring
Desc: The voice sounds a bit calmer because of the apology.

RoleContent: Those are all from your friends. Now take it and go. Oh, don't mess with me again. And no littering!
Name: Wishing Spring
Title: Wishing Spring
Desc: A chest emerges from the spring!

Name: Wishing Spring
Title: Wishing Spring
Desc: After that, the spring becomes silent again.

Name: Wishing Spring
Title: Wishing Spring
Desc: Although the silver coins have already piled up around the mouth of the spring, Tatyana still decides to give it another try.

Name: Wishing Spring
Title: Wishing Spring
Desc: Nothing happened.

RoleContent: Um? Is that... a wish granted by the spring?
Name: Wishing Spring
Title: Wishing Spring
Desc: The spring remains calm, but Tatyana finds a silver coin left by someone after taking several steps away from it.

RoleContent: Right, I'm gonna warn everybody back at home not to come here. After all... that voice sounds creepy.
Name: Wishing Spring
Title: Wishing Spring
Desc: Let's just call it a day since we've heard the strange voice already.

Name: Wishing Spring
Title: Wishing Spring
Desc: However, to her surprise, the spring becomes a famous ghost hunting spot after everyone hears about "the strange voice coming from the bottom of the spring". The mountain is filled with visitors ever since.

RoleContent: I knew it was just a rumor. After all, such thing is too good to be true.
Name: Wishing Spring
Title: Wishing Spring
Desc: Tatyana has almost finished, but nothing has changed.

RoleContent: ...Indeed!
Name: Wishing Spring
Title: Wishing Spring
Desc: A faint voice comes from the spring after Tatyana leaves with her bags,

Name: Imaginary Beast
Title: Imaginary Beast
Desc: Although the "Yeti" mystery has been solved, a new rumor about someone seeing the "bigfoot" in an ice cave in the mountain has started in the camp.

RoleContent: That's weird... I'd better have a look into this.
Name: Imaginary Beast
Title: Imaginary Beast
Desc: According to the advance team, the traces found at the scene suggest that the "bigfoot" is nothing like the 'Yeti.' It exhibits behaviors completely different from those of any known animal. They even found footprints that might have been left by the creature...

Name: Imaginary Beast
Title: Imaginary Beast
Desc: Guys from the logistics department kept watching the sighting location for days but found no trace of the "bigfoot".

Name: Imaginary Beast
Title: Imaginary Beast
Desc: Until one day, someone knocks on the cave's wall out of curiosity and hears a muffled thump of hitting on the cotton instead of a hollow thud.

RoleContent: Woo... Roar...
Name: Imaginary Beast
Title: Imaginary Beast
Desc: Tatyana instinctively senses something is off and yanks the member back. The next second, the ground under their feet starts to shake with a low growl.

Name: Imaginary Beast
Title: Imaginary Beast
Desc: It turns out that they've been standing in the ear of the 'bigfoot' the whole time!

Name: Imaginary Beast
Title: Imaginary Beast
Desc: In chaos, the team flees to the foot of a distant mountain.

RoleContent: ...Well, that's weird. The cave now looks normal again...
Name: Imaginary Beast
Title: Imaginary Beast
Desc: Tatyana is still in shock. She looks back to confirm that nothing is chasing them, then picks up the binoculars to check the cave they came from.

RoleContent: My... Guys, if you put that mountain and that hill together... it forms a sleeping giant on the snowfield, doesn't it?
Name: Imaginary Beast
Title: Imaginary Beast
Desc: Her voice starts to shake while she looks around with the binoculars.

RoleContent: My God! It must be a warning from the mountain god! He showed mercy and let us go this time! We shouldn't climb that mountain again!
Name: Imaginary Beast
Title: Imaginary Beast
Desc: Hearing that, everyone takes out their binoculars and let out a belated exclamation.

Name: Imaginary Beast
Title: Imaginary Beast
Desc: In the end, the investigation on the "bigfoot" case is suspended with no objection. Everyone involved in it agrees that sometimes it's better for a secret to remain as a secret.

Name: A Neverending Nightmare
Title: A Neverending Nightmare
Desc: Recently, many in the camp have come to Tatyana about having a nightmare. To her surprise, they seems to be bothered by the same nightmare.

Name: A Neverending Nightmare
Title: A Neverending Nightmare
Desc: They claim to have been having an endless nightmare over and over again after falling asleep. In the nightmare, humans were ruled by mechanoids and those in the camp were also locked up by them.

Name: A Neverending Nightmare
Title: A Neverending Nightmare
Desc: They tried sleeping pills and dreamcatchers, but neither helped. Once they fell asleep, the nightmare would start again right from where it ended last time.

RoleContent: Although I promised them to look into the nightmare, where should I start with something so intangible...?
Name: A Neverending Nightmare
Title: A Neverending Nightmare
Desc: Everyone in the camp is haunted by the inescapable nightmare. People can't work properly the next day, and some have even developed sleep-phobia, so they want Tatyana to figure out a way to solve the problem.

RoleContent: I remember the book says that dreams are projections of the reality... So the nightmare should be gone if I hide all the machines in the camp away.
Name: A Neverending Nightmare
Title: A Neverending Nightmare
Desc: Days have passed, Tatyana still hasn't come up with a solution. She decides to handle it with the inspiration of the projection theory from the book The Interpretation of Nightmares.

Name: A Neverending Nightmare
Title: A Neverending Nightmare
Desc: However, the nightmare still came even though she found several guys to hide away every machine in the camp. Days later, people still have to wake up with dark circles.

Name: A Neverending Nightmare
Title: A Neverending Nightmare
Desc: Despite that, nobody blames Tatyana, since she has already tried her best. They will keep on trying methods such as oil massages, lullabies, deep meditations to fight against this invisible enemy.

Name: A Neverending Nightmare
Title: A Neverending Nightmare
Desc: Tatyana asks them to fight against the evil mechanoids in the nightmare. Nobody believes it can help but tries it out anyway, and it turns out to be surprisingly effective.

RoleContent: Hey! I saw you in my dream yesterday! You slashed that evil mechanoid with a red light on the head apart! It was crazy!
Name: A Neverending Nightmare
Title: A Neverending Nightmare
Desc: People are talking about seeing each other in their dreams after waking up the next day.

RoleContent: Yeah! It was about to get you, so I took my weapon andâ€” Wait. That's weird. Our dreams are connected.
Name: A Neverending Nightmare
Title: A Neverending Nightmare
Desc: People had a heated discussion about the phenomenon but still haven't figured out why they were connected by the nightmare or how to stop it from reoccurring. However, at least they can help one another in the dream to offset the negative psychological impact.

Name: A Neverending Nightmare
Title: A Neverending Nightmare
Desc: Just like that, the "neverending nightmare" remains as a mystery unsolved in an interesting way in the camp...

Name: Prelude to the Collapse
Title: Prelude to the Collapse
Desc: A sudden avalanche hits the camp. Tatyana makes an emergency return during the mission to help the department members evacuate but only manages to save a small amount of supplies.

Name: Prelude to the Collapse
Title: Prelude to the Collapse
Desc: In the chaos, a clear, calm voice suddenly appears in Tatyana's mind.

RoleContent: ...Who's that? This is not the first time! Who's speaking to me?
Name: Prelude to the Collapse
Title: Prelude to the Collapse
Desc: <color=#3d85c6>Careful... It has noticed this place. Data of this sand table will be altered and overwritten soon... Go back to "that place" before it hides away the key clue. It holds the key you need to turn things around.</color>

Name: Prelude to the Collapse
Title: Prelude to the Collapse
Desc: There was no response. Her mind is quiet again.\nHowever, she feels she can't ignore the hint it gave her. She struggles a bit and then orders the members to evacuate to a safe location and wait for her there. She will ride a horse back to look for the clue in the camp.

Name: Prelude to the Collapse
Title: Prelude to the Collapse
Desc: Tatyana ties the horse to a small tree that can be broken in an emergency and rushes to the location indicated by the voice in her mind â€” the warehouse deep within the camp.

Name: Prelude to the Collapse
Title: Prelude to the Collapse
Desc: Due to the avalanche, most of the camp buildings are completely covered by snow. Any movement could trigger a chain reaction. She must take caution.\n\nSystem Reminder: Tiles with a countdown will fall and cannot be tapped when time's up.

Name: Prelude to the Collapse
Title: Prelude to the Collapse
Desc: She bends over to go around a few crumbling buildings and finally reaches the warehouse.

RoleContent: ...Whatever. Let's get it first. Time is running out.
Name: Prelude to the Collapse
Title: Prelude to the Collapse
Desc: It's strange that she seemed to have absolutely no memory of it or of anyone mentioning it to her before the voice told her about it.

Name: Prelude to the Collapse
Title: Prelude to the Collapse
Desc: She opens the gate. A metal box rests quietly in the warehouse as if the entire building were built to seal this little object.

Name: Prelude to the Collapse
Title: Prelude to the Collapse
Desc: Tatyana puts the little metal box in her jacket pocket and leaves in a hurry.

RoleContent: Cough, damn, the road back is blocked...
Name: Prelude to the Collapse
Title: Prelude to the Collapse
Desc: Now that the original path has been cut off, Tatyana could only pray silently that her horse could escape successfully. She hurries up.

Name: Prelude to the Collapse
Title: Prelude to the Collapse
Desc: After a series of struggles, Tatyana has finally caught up with the members who have been waiting for her in the distance and evacuated out of the area affected by the avalanche.

RoleContent: And that voice is gone...
Name: Prelude to the Collapse
Title: Prelude to the Collapse
Desc: After the snowstorm has stopped and everything has been settled, she remembers the metal box found in her pocket.

Name: Prelude to the Collapse
Title: Prelude to the Collapse
Desc: Thinking of the voice that appeared and helped her multiple times, she opens the box with determination.

RoleContent: T H I S... I S... N O T...
Name: Prelude to the Collapse
Title: Prelude to the Collapse
Desc: Inside the box is a yellowed scroll of paper note with a message written in Morse code. With her familiarity of various means of communication since a young age and her experience of working with her father, Tatyana can read it just like reading a normal piece of text.

RoleContent: T H E... T U R E... W O R L D.
Name: Prelude to the Collapse
Title: Prelude to the Collapse
Desc: Her voice starts to shake.

Name: Singularity
Title: Singularity
Desc:
On an ordinary day, Tatyana wakes up on the bed with a sudden, strange, inexpressible loneliness.

It feels like watching a sand table fall off her hands over and over again, and there's nothing she can do except watch it collapse and fade away.

When Tatyana is still trying to figure out why she has this feeling, her colleagues rush in and ask for support for emergencies that took place simultaneously at three different locations in New Sophiasburgh.

Name: Singularity
Title: Singularity
Desc: It feels like watching a sand table fall off her hands over and over again, and there's nothing she can do except watch it collapse and fade away.

Name: Singularity
Title: Singularity
Desc: When Tatyana is still trying to figure out why she has this feeling, her colleagues rush in and ask for support for emergencies that took place simultaneously at three different locations in New Sophiasburgh.

Name: Singularity
Title: Singularity
Desc: Now she has no time to worry about the weird feeling. She immediately rushes to the situation room for a debriefing.

RoleContent: New Sophiasburgh's underground energy center, the lighthouse by the sea, and the newly built research station are all under the attack of the Corrupted.
Name: Singularity
Title: Singularity
Desc: Sergey and the others are already there when Tatyana walks in. Sergey proceeds directly and explains the current situation in a few sentences.

RoleContent: I don't understand. The Corrupted are not capable of thinking, and they never take orders... Why would they launch attacks on locations that are so far apart from each other?
Name: Singularity
Title: Singularity
Desc: Tatyana notices something abnormal right away.

RoleContent: I don't know. People like us are better at fighting battles than speculating about things. You should ask folks at the research station about it.
Name: Singularity
Title: Singularity
Desc: Not to mention that those are the most important buildings in New Sophiasburgh, especially the observatory that holds the "signals" sent by the Narwhals during the past few months on the top floor of the lighthouse.

RoleContent: But what I do know is that New Sophiasburgh will be totally screwed if we don't take actions now.
Name: Singularity
Title: Singularity
Desc: Sergey seems impatient. He then brings the topic back to the current situation.

RoleContent: Don't worry. I'll take care of it. No matter what they want, I'll make sure they won't get it.
Name: Singularity
Title: Singularity
Desc: Tatyana turns to the members who are clearly upset by what Sergey said and gives them a reassuring look.

Name: Singularity
Title: Singularity
Desc: The underground energy center is packed with small Corrupted. Staff are screaming while running out of the building.

RoleContent: Go ahead! Turn the 'emergency evacuation mode' on to bring down the gates and they won't get it!
Name: Singularity
Title: Singularity
Desc: Tatyana raises her shotgun and reloads while walking against the crowd under the cover of Rosetta into the control room.

RoleContent: We are safe now. Leave the rest to us. Those minions are no match for us Forest Guards.
Name: Singularity
Title: Singularity
Desc: The emergency evacuation mode is on. Alarms start blaring in the control room. Gates fall down within seconds. A few Corrupted manage to get in but are pierced by Rosetta's spear.

Name: Singularity
Title: Singularity
Desc: Tatyana doesn't have time to thank the Forest Guard. She gives Rosetta a grateful look and leaves in a hurry.

Name: Singularity
Title: Singularity
Desc: Tatyana rides her horse to the lighthouse. She sees Diana and a few Constructs fighting against a Corrupted crowd under the lighthouse from a hill several hundred meters away.

RoleContent: I've transferred the Narwhal signal recorder to the top floor. Go! We will stall these Corrupted!
Name: Singularity
Title: Singularity
Desc: Diana sees Tatyana as well and immediately captures the latter's purpose. She raises her spear and rides away, leading a bunch of the Corrupted away from the gate.

RoleContent: Both the recorder and the data are safe! Thank you! I've gotta go!
Name: Singularity
Title: Singularity
Desc: With Diana's help, Tatyana has successfully taken the Narwhal signal recorder from the top floor of the lighthouse. She secures it firmly in the saddle bag and shouts to Diana from a distance.

Name: Singularity
Title: Singularity
Desc: Diana doesn't respond but waves to Tatyana while fighting the Corrupted.

RoleContent: ...Looks like a fight is inevitable. Then I'll make sure you enjoy it!
Name: Singularity
Title: Singularity
Desc: Tatyana gets rid of the Corrupted on her tail and arrives at the Narwhal research station with the recorder. The gate is also blocked by the Corrupted, except this time, nobody's there to help her.

Name: Singularity
Title: Singularity
Desc: She takes a deep breath, pulls out her axe from the back, and rides into the crowd with determination.

RoleContent: Haha, you are as reckless as when you were a kid.
Name: Singularity
Title: Singularity
Desc: Gunshots ring out. Figures emerges from the smoke, people knows all too well.

RoleContent: Exactly. Why did you come here without notifying us, boss? We were waiting for your signal to attack from within there.
Name: Singularity
Title: Singularity
Desc: Several logistics department members walk out from the research station. It appears they came here voluntarily to protect the researchers when the crisis broke out.

RoleContent: Sorry... I though I was the only one.
Name: Singularity
Title: Singularity
Desc: She softens her tone unconsciously in face of the pleasant surprise.

RoleContent: Never mind. You can thank us later. The priority is to get these Corrupted out of here!
Name: Singularity
Title: Singularity
Desc: They stand shoulder to shoulder and point their weapons to the Corrupted.

Name: Singularity
Title: Singularity
Desc: After the long battle, everyone is lying on the ground, gasping heavily in exhaustion.

RoleContent: Oh! I wanna give this to you.
Name: Singularity
Title: Singularity
Desc: Hearing the noise outside quiet down, a couple of researchers walk out timidly. They get immediately shocked by the bodies of the Corrupted all over the place.

RoleContent: Thank you! We were worrying if it would be damaged by the Corrupted during the chaos.
Name: Singularity
Title: Singularity
Desc: Tatyana takes out the recorder from the saddle bag. It has all the data the Forest Guards have collected on Narwhals since the construction of the lighthouse.

RoleContent: We are grateful for your efforts. Let us follow up with the analysis. We will find the answer hidden behind the Narwhals.
Name: Singularity
Title: Singularity
Desc:
One of the researchers takes the device carefully. The researchers nod deeply to thank the department members.

Out of the crisis, Tatyana is back at home again after the long day. Lying on her bed, she thinks back on what happened and suddenly remembers the strange feeling she had earlier in the morning.

However, the ominous feeling is gone after the fierce fights she had.

Name: Singularity
Title: Singularity
Desc: The researchers nod deeply to thank the department members.

Name: Singularity
Title: Singularity
Desc: Out of the crisis, Tatyana is back at home again after the long day. Lying on her bed, she thinks back on what happened and suddenly remembers the strange feeling she had earlier in the morning.

Name: Singularity
Title: Singularity
Desc: However, the ominous feeling is gone after the fierce fights she had.

RoleContent: That's right. No matter what happens, I will find a way out with my own hands.
Name: Singularity
Title: Singularity
Desc: She keeps the assurance in her heart.

Name: Classified Files
Title: Classified Files
Desc: Not long after the research station has been established, researchers start to gradually restore the classified files from the lab abandoned during the Golden Age and submit them to Tatyana.

Name: Classified Files
Title: Classified Files
Desc: It would cost a lot of time to get useful information from these wordy old files...

Name: Classified Files
Title: Classified Files
Desc: Tatyana already has a lot on her plate. There's no time for these files. Let's read them later.

Name: Classified Files
Title: Classified Files
Desc: Tatyana makes time for the files. She goes through the papers carefully and finds a meaningful journal.

Name: Classified Files
Title: Classified Files
Desc:
Thoughts on Improving the Application Plan of Bionic Machines Through The "Matrix" Technology

I find Leibowitz's "Matrix" Project quite interesting, but the direction is wrong.

It's impossible for the "Matrix" to produce a life form perfect enough to replace mankind. And the way they treated the students disgusts me. They were using them as tools. However, I have to pretend that I agree with them so that I can keep using their research results while running my admin privileges secretly.

Name: Classified Files
Title: Classified Files
Desc:
I modified the simulation instance into a simulator to test Earth's ecosphere and the impact of bionic machines on this land.

I despise myself for using the bad guys' technology, but I have to borrow their framework to achieve it.

To differentiate my simulator from their bloody "matrix", I named it the "sand table".

Name: Classified Files
Title: Classified Files
Desc: The journal ends here. Judging from the content, the author should be some researcher in that nameless lab, and there should be follow-up documents.\n\nThey are likely to be discovered as the excavation continues.

Name: Classified Files
Title: Classified Files
Desc: A staff member of the research station reports to have found a follow-up document for the journal they submitted earlier, but they can't make sense of it and would like Tatyana to help.

Name: Classified Files
Title: Classified Files
Desc: Tatyana picks up the file and sees a bunch of unordered numbers.

Name: Classified Files
Title: Classified Files
Desc:
Data From Sand Table Simulation 7114
Surface Survival Rate: 32.236582569%
Bionic Creature Malfunction Rate: 79.253476734%
Habitable Land Establishment Rate: 0.2238579%

Name: Classified Files
Title: Classified Files
Desc: The first half is numeric, but the second half is completely unreadable code.\nAccording to the researchers, they have tried their best to recover the data, but the second part seems to be "alive". Every time they attempted to decode it with a language, it would change to another unreadable form.

Name: Classified Files
Title: Classified Files
Desc: It's probably going to take some time before they recover all the data. Let's focus on other tasks before that.

RoleContent: Part of the data is constantly changing because it was "calculating" the data captured from terminals! That lab might look abandoned, but some of its terminals are still operating! Those terminals have secretly intruded into ours!
Name: Classified Files
Title: Classified Files
Desc: A while later, the researcher reports in panic that they have finally discovered the reason why the data keeps "changing".

RoleContent: All this time, we've been watched by a mysterious third party! And they have probably seized all our confidential information! This is serious! We must make it public and ask everyone to seal off their terminal!
Name: Classified Files
Title: Classified Files
Desc: He takes out a page of the analysis. Through layered analysis, all records ultimately point to something familiar â€” the sand table.

RoleContent: I see. We will start a meeting right away.
Name: Classified Files
Title: Classified Files
Desc: The researcher is in great panic, shocked by the finding apparently. However, the warning is not without reason. If that person uses New Sophiasburgh's secret information to attack them, the consequences would be catastrophic...

Name: Classified Files
Title: Classified Files
Desc:
After a serious discussion, the Border Commune decides to accept the researcher's advice and make the information public.

It has led to a short panic among New Sophiasburgh citizens, but soon the rational ones among them start to advocate that the impact can be minimized as long as everybody can start protecting their terminal by storing new confidential information separately from today.

Eventually, the citizens have voluntarily finished the data migration and moved all their secret information to offline environments. The identity of the owner of the nameless lab is yet to be discovered, but at least everyone is more alert to the name 'sand table system' now.

Perhaps time will solve the mystery one day...

Name: Classified Files
Title: Classified Files
Desc: Eventually, the citizens have voluntarily finished the data migration and moved all their secret information to offline environments.

Name: Classified Files
Title: Classified Files
Desc: The identity of the owner of the nameless lab is still yet to be discovered, but at least everyone is more alert to the name 'sand table system' now.\nPerhaps time will solve the mystery one day...

Name: Classified Files
Title: Classified Files
Desc: After an internal discussion, the Border Commune decides to not make it public to avoid mass panic.\n\nEventually, everybody agrees to keep it confidential while carrying out a secret investigation on the mystery of that nameless lab.

Name: Echoes in the Dream
Title: Echoes in the Dream
Desc: In a long dream, you feel yourself lying in a cold coffin.

Name: Echoes in the Dream
Title: Echoes in the Dream
Desc: There is no sound, no light, and no sense of things changing as the time flows. Everything here seems forever frozen.

RoleContent: ...Who are you?
Name: Echoes in the Dream
Title: Echoes in the Dream
Desc: And beyond that fragile, transparent wall, something seems to be calling.

Name: Echoes in the Dream
Title: Echoes in the Dream
Desc: The figure fades into the thick, sticky darkness.

RoleContent: Then prove that you are qualified for it.
Name: Echoes in the Dream
Title: Echoes in the Dream
Desc: The figure fades into the thick, sticky darkness.

RoleContent: Have you decided where to go this time?
Name: Echoes in the Dream
Title: Echoes in the Dream
Desc: You're back again, to this empty dream of eternal winter and night.

Name: Echoes in the Dream
Title: Echoes in the Dream
Desc: The figure stares at you in silence, refusing to answer any questions.

RoleContent: It's not easy. I hope you have figured out the way to break out from this cage.
Name: Echoes in the Dream
Title: Echoes in the Dream
Desc: The figure seems to nod to you slightly and then fades out of the dream.

RoleContent: I'm here to say goodbye. But I guess you're here for the same reason. You will leave this place one day, right?
Name: Echoes in the Dream
Title: Echoes in the Dream
Desc: You are back to the dream again, except this time, you no longer feel the bone-chilling coldness, and that wall seems to have turned into thin melting ice. You can hear it cracking above your head when you close your eyes.

RoleContent: Then good luck. Let's meet somewhere else outside the sand box one day.
Name: Echoes in the Dream
Title: Echoes in the Dream
Desc: The figure turns around and walks into a faint light.

Name: Sand Table's Reminder
Title: Sand Table's Reminder
Desc: The time in the "sand table" has inevitably changed its direction. Come here again at the right time.

Name: On the Edge of the Sand Table
Title: On the Edge of the Sand Table
Desc:
Walking alone on the snowfield, Tatyana feels as if her heart were squeezed by a pair of invisible hands. A strong impulse is urging her to go somewhere immediately.

She follows the strange feeling to a ruin on the edge of the frozen land. As she expected, there is a damaged machine partâ€”a sound wave receiver from a Narwhal.

Just when she bends down to pick it up, an impact suddenly comes from behindâ€”

Name: On the Edge of the Sand Table
Title: On the Edge of the Sand Table
Desc: A giant, strange machine that is not supposed to exist in this area is coming at her with a huge blade.

RoleContent: Right... I should send this receiver to the "Narwhal" research center and let the researchers do the analysis.
Name: On the Edge of the Sand Table
Title: On the Edge of the Sand Table
Desc: Tatyana used all her effort to have barely defeated the mysterious machine. Her instinct tells her to get out of here asap, so she jumps onto the horse and gallops off with the machine part without examining the machine.\n\nOn the way, she makes some time to quickly check the receiver. It seems there's another recording chip in it. There should be something inside.

RoleContent: That's weird... My feet... I can't move...
Name: On the Edge of the Sand Table
Title: On the Edge of the Sand Table
Desc: Tatyana used all her effort to have barely defeated the mysterious machine. Just when she plans to walk up and check its identity, her body is suddenly engulfed by a strange feeling.

RoleContent: You think... I'll make the same mistake again?
Name: On the Edge of the Sand Table
Title: On the Edge of the Sand Table
Desc: The Corrupted machine on the floor that should've been terminated already is standing up slowing with its red eyes lit up again.

Name: Wishing Spring
Title: Wishing Spring
Desc: Commune members who were sent to work at the farm earlier have reported that they came across a hot spring during work. After simple construction, it has now come into use as an outdoor public bath.

Name: Wishing Spring
Title: Wishing Spring
Desc: However, someone has discovered a "secret function" of this hot spring and claims that one can get their wishes granted by throwing specific things into the spring.

Name: Wishing Spring
Title: Wishing Spring
Desc: As the rumor gets spread wider and wider, the spring is now filled with people who come here to verify the rumor. To restore the original function of the spring, the commune members want Tatyana to go there to check out.

Name: Wishing Spring
Title: Wishing Spring
Desc: Although the rumor sounds absurd, Tatyana leaves for the mountain with a bunch of weird stuff since everyone is counting on her.\n\n<color=#3d85c6>No need to go through every possibility. Just throw the can into it!</color>

Name: Nameless Lab
Title: Nameless Lab
Desc: The advance team responsible for Golden Age relics excavation has reported back on a nameless lab that seems to hold a lot of classified research materials among the snow mountains.

Name: Nameless Lab
Title: Nameless Lab
Desc: However, further exploration requires more people.\n\n<color=#3d85c6>You have this strange gut feeling that urges you to go to that lab immediately.</color>

Name: Belongings Under the Ice
Title: Belongings Under the Ice
Desc: New Sophiasburgh established a research station that focuses on Narwhals. Not long after that, the station has reported that they seem to have found an abandoned bionic creature factory in an ice lake.

Name: Belongings Under the Ice
Title: Belongings Under the Ice
Desc: Tatyana and a couple of researchers carry out an investigation at the ice lake. On the surface is a giant chunk of ice that is about several meters tall, sealing up the entire lake. It's hard to reach the factory at the bottom just by digging.\n\n<color=#3d85c6>A strange idea somehow comes to your mind, "Why not be bolder and dig all the way to the bottom?"</color>

Name: Astrologer in the Tower's Top Attic
Title: Astrologer in the Tower's Top Attic
Desc: During a short expedition, the team comes across an ancient tower. In the top chamber lives an early polar inhabitantâ€”a young female astrologer.\nHer secluded lifestyle and the special location of the tower have allowed her to luckily avoid the Corrupted by herself.
UnOpenDesc: Astrologer in the Tower's Top Attic

RoleContent: Which star is the brightest in the sky...?
Name: Astrologer in the Tower's Top Attic
Title: Astrologer in the Tower's Top Attic
Desc: To thank you for the update on the outside world, she decides to do a free reading for you... However, as usual, she needs you to answer a few questions first.\n\n<color=#3d85c6>Looking at the astrologer, you have a gut feeling that the "polar star" is not the right answer.</color>
UnOpenDesc: Astrologer in the Tower's Top Attic

RoleContent: Right. Next question...
Name: Astrologer in the Tower's Top Attic
Title: Astrologer in the Tower's Top Attic
Desc: The young astrologer remains expressionless and noncommittal.
UnOpenDesc: Astrologer in the Tower's Top Attic

RoleContent: It has been a long while since someone last spotted the flaw in the question... Yeah, the sun is also a star and the brightest entity we can observe. Your answer is correct.
Name: Astrologer in the Tower's Top Attic
Title: Astrologer in the Tower's Top Attic
Desc: The young astrologer looks surprised.
UnOpenDesc: Astrologer in the Tower's Top Attic

RoleContent: Between the Sun and the Earth, which one revolves around the other one?
Name: Astrologer in the Tower's Top Attic
Title: Astrologer in the Tower's Top Attic
Desc: The young astrologer turns the pages of the notebook in her hand and throws out another questionâ€”\n\n<color=#3d85c6>Careful. That's another trap. Both of the stars are "revolving."</color>
UnOpenDesc: Astrologer in the Tower's Top Attic

Name: A Neverending Nightmare
Title: A Neverending Nightmare
Desc: Recently, many in the camp have come to Tatyana about having a nightmare. To her surprise, they seem to be bothered by the same nightmare.

Name: A Neverending Nightmare
Title: A Neverending Nightmare
Desc: They claim to have been having an endless nightmare over and over again after falling asleep. In the nightmare, humans were ruled by mechanoids and those in the camp were also locked up by them.

Name: A Neverending Nightmare
Title: A Neverending Nightmare
Desc: They tried sleeping pills and dreamcatchers, but neither helped. Once they fell asleep, the nightmare would start again right from where it ended last time.

RoleContent: Although I promised them to look into the nightmare, where should I start with something so intangible...?
Name: A Neverending Nightmare
Title: A Neverending Nightmare
Desc: Everyone in the camp is haunted by the inescapable nightmare. People can't work properly the next day, and some have even developed sleep-phobia, so they want Tatyana to figure out a way to solve the problem.\n\n<color=#3d85c6>Isn't that easy? Since we are already in the dream, we might as well fight back against the "bad guys" in it.</color>
